document.full_text: victor toro, a bronx activist who was imprisoned in chile during the pinochet regime, has not muted his left-wing rhetoric since his battle in immigration court began.
document.title: victor toro, tortured in chile, fights deportation
lines_and_colors: victor toro, a bronx activist who was imprisoned in chile during the pinochet regime, has not muted his left-wing rhetoric since his battle in immigration court began.
